website_summaries.verdict: Convenient and portable thanks to its wireless capability, this reads most barcodes without difficulty but has a short lifespan.
pros: Scans barcodes reliably, including problematic labels such as on curved surfaces
Comes with preset configurations for common scanning needs
Connects seamlessly to PCs, either wirelessly or via its USB charging and data cable
cons: Instruction sheet does not include all the scanner’s available programming barcodes
Many units stop working after just a few months of use, or batteries stop holding a charge

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended. No software needed. It basically ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. No software needed. It basically acts as if it just typed out the tracking number into wherever your cursor was it, be it in a webpage, word document, or spreadsheet. It scans all barcodes I've tried including USPS, UPS, Fedex, and Amazon ASIN labels. No mention or need for charging yet so I don't know how that will work.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick but not ideal for everyday retail use. Might hold up for occasional scanning needs.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for two different work stations. From the beginning one scanner couldn't scan some smaller bar-code labels when the other one would scan them without difficulty. Now a year later I have dismantled both scanners a couple times to keep them working. The spring broke in one trigger and I had to bend the trigger switch inside so the switch wasn't constantly held down. The retainer that holds the battery board broke and had to be repaired in the other. They are both still working but I wouldn't order the same one again considering we only got a year of use out of each.
customer_reviews.author: Allen F. Difrischia

customer_reviews.title: ****Updated to 4 stars****
customer_reviews.text: ****Customer service continued to work towards resolution of the problem. replaced unit and scanning as expected. They were very good to deal with after going through Amazon and not their regular customer service.******I am updating this to reflect that having posted this review, I received contact from a different customer support person that has been working to resolve the problem. Whether it ever is resolved, I think they are showing a good faith effort to work with me as a customer.*** Poor scanning performance. Emails with tech support OK until I asked to replace as defective - then they quit answering email. Waste of money. Too late to return. Save yourself the hassle and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: NORBVR

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service and great basic scanner
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 8 of these for our warehouse and only 1 of them was defective (would not charge). The instructions are a little ridiculous -- lots of typos, clearly not written by a fluent English-speaker, very vague -- but it's a basic scanner so you don't need to know much more than how to start the scanning. The manufacturer was very quick about replying to my email regarding the 1 defective scanner, and they were equally as quick about getting a replacement sent out. No complaints about the product or the customer service I received.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Shaltz

customer_reviews.title: and they all work great - with no conflicts with each other
customer_reviews.text: These solved a long standing problem that the wired units had. This thing scans the hardest to read barcodes, that our older scanners had problems with. We have added these to all of the main computers in the warehouse, and they all work great - with no conflicts with each other. Additionally, the offline scanning is AMAZING! Saves me so much time when I have to head from my office to scan a bunch of barcodes. Actually works amazing for inventory, since I can head out - scan everything - come back, and upload it all at one time. Thank you Inateck, for making a good product. I appreciate it. (Hard to find good things these days.)
customer_reviews.author: Tomy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Well built, simple, reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I have been so impressed. We have some Wasp scanners that are similar to this that we paid about $400 for. These little gems seem every bit as reliable as the Wasp counterparts. My favorite thing about these is that it charges with USB and you can download scanned values (from offline mode) via USB. The Wasp things have this weird proprietary base. The USB is just easier. Also, these download the buffered values (from offline mode) WAYYYY faster than the Wasp scanners do. Overall, I'm so very impressed by these things.
customer_reviews.author: m8i

customer_reviews.title: Worked well no issues
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, no issues. Arrived charged. Installed wireless adapter on laptop using Windows 7. Drivers installed automatically by windows. Scanner linked up to laptop and worked immediately. Each barcode scan created an entry in Excel. The scanner was already configured to add an enter after each scan. I did not have to change any settings and was able to use the scanner immediately. Scanner case is a hard plastic. I would not recommend dropping it on a warehouse floor but seems durable enough for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Instruction are a bit brief but fortunately this was plug and play! Item was exactly as described, well packed and arrived as scheduled. I am using this with CellarTracker software for wine cellar management. As soon as I plugged in the adapter the scanner worked on the barcodes I had placed on the bottled. Keep the instruction sheet!! I has barcodes you will need to program any changed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Fechtner

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first barcode scanner and I like the quality of this item. I called the U.S. vendor and got useful advice on which model would work best with my needs, level of experience, and budget. I wish the item had a storage slot for the USB interface transmitter/receiver, but I will just have to be careful not to lose it or forget to what it's paired. Comes with a USB cable for charging and in lieu of wireless operation.
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: THey need to add capability of making suffix character something like semi-colon, colon or pipe so you can collect ...
customer_reviews.text: THe postfix or suffix character can only be set to a tab or return. Both of these characters make entry to our web screens move to the next field, or submit. It would be nice if they added capability of making suffix character something like semi-colon, colon or pipe so you can collect a number of bar codes into a web screen and then download when finished. Customer service and response from Inateck about this issue was terrific. If you don't need special prefix, I would recommend this to friend.
customer_reviews.author: cda customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall great scanner.
customer_reviews.text: This scanner works great. I simply plug the 2.4GHz receiver into the USB port of the computer I want to use this scanner with and I am scanning in seconds. I use this scanner of inventory of the two Verizon stores I am co-owner of. My only complaint with this scanner is sometimes it seems to get bogged down, and has to catch up. It scans reliably and works quite far away from the receiver. For the price, you can not go wrong. I could purchase several of these scanners compared to the big name scanners at an office store.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: lasted less than a year . update : Customer service for Inateck was awesome they had replacement unit to me in no time , and everything is a ok .Only one problem scanner can not scan long barcodes about 7" or longer ,other than that great scanner quick and can scan at multiple angles .
customer_reviews.author: EmranHassan

customer_reviews.title: Huge time saver...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It works as advertised. It had a couple issues with reading barcodes on curved objects but once I figured out the scanner needed to be at least 12 inches from the curved barcode, everything worked fine. Flat barcodes had no problems. Only had a few non-reads over 300+ scans. Saved me a ton of time over manually entering the data I needed. If I could, I would give it 4.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: T. Marek

customer_reviews.title: Greatest thing since slided bread.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. No setup was necessary. Just plug in the USB receiver and go. If you've been using a wired unit you will LOVE having a wireless scanner. Charges easily and charge lasts forever. Well done and extremely useful.
customer_reviews.author: VonBach

customer_reviews.title: Great Scanner!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to scan our books for Amazon. We have had it for about a month and it has worked flawlessly. I have not had to charge it since the first charging when we received it. This model does not have the bluetooth but they do offer another one that does. We don't plan on pairing it with our phones so it is not a problem. I would highly recommend this scanner!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: The first replacement seems to be working just fine. Hopefully I just got a couple lemons
customer_reviews.text: I'll give it one more chance. So far I've bought two and replaced them both. The first one was inside the return window, the second was not. The first replacement seems to be working just fine. Hopefully I just got a couple lemons. UPDATE: I was contacted by Inateck after I posted the above review. They wanted to make sure my experience with their product was the best it could be. As a result they sent me a replacement free of charge. I'm extremely impressed with this company and how much they care about their product quality and customer experience. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Josh E.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The scanner is light in weight and very responsive even to tore up bar codes. The lightness is what I love the most, I can scan for hours, And with out my wrist hurting. I had a small issue with my first one, But the company, and customer service really cares about its product, and its customer it went beyond the norm to make it right for me They earn my business and would recommend them to My family, friends, and Business Partners.
customer_reviews.author: AngelStereo

customer_reviews.title: finer codes. Scanning two identical barcodes
customer_reviews.text: The scanner didn't work for us. The resolution just isn't high enough to read smaller, finer codes. Scanning two identical barcodes, the lighter of the two scanned fine. The darker label, with slightly blurred the lines, wouldn't read. Our old Honeywell read both just fine. On a bright note, the company's customer service is outstanding! They emailed me after receiving the device to ask if everything was okay. They then helped trouble shoot via email. They admitted that it was a resolution issue, and that they have a newer model coming out in December which should work better. Sadly, this one has to go back.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Bonewitz

customer_reviews.title: VERY SLOW!
customer_reviews.text: Super slow to scan. I thought this was somewhat normal because of it being a wireless scanner. However, after buying and trying a different brand of wireless scanner, I noticed this new one scans super fast as if it was plugged via USB. I originally bought 2 of these Inatech scanners but both scan very slow. The one I recommend is from WoneNice (black with blue trim) and is also wireless as well as having the option for USB connection.
customer_reviews.author: L2BCycles

customer_reviews.title: Defective Unit (Seller took care of issue)
customer_reviews.text: Item worked for about 4-5 months, and then all of a sudden quit working. If I pay $50 for a scanner it better last longer than a year. Product is cheaply made. Needless to say we will be buying another brand. Edit: Seller contacted us and shipped us a new scanner as the old one was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable and instructions are pretty good. Good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and serves my purpose. Seems durable and instructions are pretty good. Good battery life. After using for a while, I probably should have ordered the Bluetooth model so it would be compatible with my iPhone Apps.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Work great for me.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my purposes. I have a computer repair shop and I assign my own part numbers to items. I purchased 2 of the scanners and so far they are working great.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Work great. I really like the quality.
customer_reviews.text: This barcode scanner works great. It does not lag and even in low light condition scan with out a problem. The distance range is pretty good, I was scanning items on the other side of my office.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: The range is quite good and response is very fast
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this scanner in a library checkout and inventory system, and it seems to work quite well. The range is quite good and response is very fast. I haven't used the scanner a lot so far, but my initial impression is favorable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Rothenberg

customer_reviews.title: Fast Bar Code Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Beam me up Scotty. This bar code reader works great for less money and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: and it is awesome. Fast reading
customer_reviews.text: I thought about buying an industrial strength scanner for my small warehouse business but decided to try the Inateck first, and it is awesome. Fast reading, even with dusty, dirty barcodes, and given the price I'll buy another as a backup and still have a couple hundred dollars left versus buying a "commercial" scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Piper Smith

customer_reviews.title: Barcode Reader  - it reads barcodes.
customer_reviews.text: I don't actually know how it performs as I bought it for our production operators. As nobody has complained though, I'll assume that it functions as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for months. Works out of the box. Truly plug and play. I haven't used any of the special functions yet, but the basic scan function works flawlessly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far, this item is exactly what we needed. Light weight. So very easy to use. I gave 4 stars only because we just received this and I have no idea how it will stand up. I will come back after we've had it awhile and hopefully, be able to give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ott

customer_reviews.title: the battery seem to be good, my complaint would be the fact that the ...
customer_reviews.text: the battery seem to be good, my complaint would be the fact that the scanner is pretty bad scanning surface like plastic or small barcode
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless scanner
customer_reviews.text: For the price these scanners can't be beat, they have about a 20 foot range! We are very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Saylor

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product for the price. We have run into some barcodes it won't read. Especially those with a somewhat uneven surface. We just stuck our own on those.
customer_reviews.author: C. Storm

customer_reviews.title: A scanner that really works
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm and has saved me hours of squinting at barcodes and trying to type them in. Works straight into my FileMaker Pro solutions I develop both for adding and finding inventory. One charge lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Alfontso

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were more stars than 5! the product is OK, works fairly well for the price, and it has a good wireless range, not as fast as other brands but it is accurate with no wrong recording. the 5+ stars come from the customer service, it stopped working suddenly, I contacted them and they sent me a replacement within a week or so, this is truly exceptional and truly nice to have such a good customer service, they even didn't ask me to return the broken one! I Think it is a good product with EXCELLENT company.
customer_reviews.author: Tawfiq

customer_reviews.title: Good product, no dongle storage
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I use it for logging inventory for my church. I found that the range is pretty decent(like 10-15 feet) and that it will store around 8 scans. So if you walk out of range and scan 8 bar codes and return it will send the data to the PC all at once. My biggest issue is that there is nowhere on the scanner itself to store the USB dongle, which is very annoying. If I did not use a different work PC to do the scanning I would lose the dongle fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Metro C.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star tech 4 star for lack of manual
customer_reviews.text: The only reason it's not 5 stars is no Manual. I'm not tech savvy so I struggled in beginning to figure out how it worked. Once we figured that out everyone at work lives it.
customer_reviews.author: Chigirl645

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Wireless receiver instantly recognized by Windows 10. Feels very well-built and comfortable to use. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Kerfoot

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED: Stop working after 40 days/ REPLACED
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my company for scanning serial barcodes. Purchased on 08/26/16, stopped working on 10/06/16. UPDATE: Inateck contacted me and got me a new unit that work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Will C.

customer_reviews.title: Scanning Inventory
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to document inventory as I was doing this manually. Did a lot of research and decided to go with this option. Although the instructions are hard to understand, you can go online to the manufacturer's website and read the manual. However, I just opened and excel spreadsheet, and started scanning. Everything populated instantly!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for scanning kegs for our new brewery and I am very pleased with this purchase. Excellent quality finish to the scanner. Range is also impressive using the wireless connection. I connected it to a raspberry pi and it was up and running in an hour or two and I have never purchased a scanner before.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ashikawa

customer_reviews.title: Great for scanning everything!  So far has not failed one scan.
customer_reviews.text: Love this one. Bought a cheap model and brand that didn't work all of the time. Bought this one and so far it has not failed once.
customer_reviews.author: Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Scans slow and have to savant close and wiggle around for it to beep
customer_reviews.author: freeman

customer_reviews.title: The included manual is missing a lot of the management ...
customer_reviews.text: The included manual is missing a lot of the management codes and doesn't have a lot of information of what or why you would need to change the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Peters

customer_reviews.title: Better then much more expensive scanners
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these now and they work great, no setup needed and they scan much easier then the scanners we have that cost $250. Couldnt be happier with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and does what its supposed to do. The unit can go long periods of time without a recharge. Most P.O.S software says you can only use the "approved scanners" with the program but any scanner will work. This comment is geared toward intuit pos software. Yes you can use any scanner, wireless or not with quickbooks pos.
customer_reviews.author: calculator

customer_reviews.title: works great! NO cord
customer_reviews.text: works great! NO cord - I can walk all around my (small) warehouse and scan what I need no more dragging things over to the computer to scan them.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This device is a pleasure to work with! So easy! I was worried when there weren't any real instructions, but I just plugged it in, and it worked! One minor annoyance, it saves the page automatically every time I use it, which often requires me to acknowledge the save before I can input another UPC code.
customer_reviews.author: rlh1236

customer_reviews.title: The battery just won't die - It's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We've used this roughly every single day for over a year. We have NEVER charged it. Yes, you heard me right, we NEVER have charged this thing. The battery just won't die - It's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last very long...
customer_reviews.text: I had this item for less than a year and in the middle of using it, it just stopped working. Very disappointed considering it was only used occasionally to maintain inventory levels.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Works with our 7" winbooks, just plug it in ...
customer_reviews.text: Works with our 7" winbooks, just plug it in and scan. reading distance is shorter than the symbols we are used to but for the price, I'd go with this over a $300 symbol scanner any day (unless you need to read labels from more than 8" away.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E.

customer_reviews.title: The one that works is a good one but the distance to the computer could be ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these scanners for our new inventory system and couldn't be happier. I have to admit, one of the scanner broke after using it for a few weeks and the company was even gracious enough to send me another one. Great Customer service and quality products. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use this to scan barcodes that are under glass ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to scan barcodes that are under glass or on a curved surface. It works very well. The connection to my laptop was flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Brown

customer_reviews.title: What a time saver!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for inventory and cut the time in half. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with the first one I bought but it was promptly replaced by the manufacturer. Good Customer service.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic product, reliable and so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product, reliable and so easy to use, scans more reliably than my previous wired scanner, and I love that my cashier is not tethered to the cash register !- could not believe the performance for the price. The company is very helpful and responsive. I am very happy with this purchase and recommend it highly.,
customer_reviews.author: Annick L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and feels sturdy. Works perfectly out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and feels sturdy. Works perfectly out of the box. Windows recognizes it as HID (human interface device; i.e. keyboard) as soon as plugged in. You can select for it to enter a "return" character at the end of every string read or not. Note that this version only reads bar code NOT 2-D code. There is another version for that. Also (potentially useful, depending on your application), it is wireless and rechargeable (through its USB port). It's little receiver plugs in to the computer's USB port. It can also be used wired, which eliminates the need to remember to charge it. Nice wand and to make a good thing better, it is priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. X

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well and was easy to set up. I have to say that I wasnt expecting much but I was really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rah

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price and pretty easy to use and configure.
customer_reviews.author: DHANEESH N.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 2 of these. I haven't had them ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these. I haven't had them for long, but so far they have performed flawlessly. I'm not sure whey I kept ordering the name brand wired models.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The USB dongle broke. Will not function without it. Will the manufacturer replace?
customer_reviews.author: Mr. John

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and effortless use in my small business.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: It is fast and being able to use it wireless is awesome! Great value too
customer_reviews.text: I only use this scanner for its most basic function: scanning UPC codes to research or enter new products into my inventory. It is fast and being able to use it wireless is awesome! Great value too!
customer_reviews.author: CAS

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I needed, but good instructions are hard to come by. I had to contact the company twice to get an explanation of how to do certain functions.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Nick

customer_reviews.title: Worked right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box. Remember to set the correct code scanner mode with the booklet that comes with it. Very Important.
customer_reviews.author: Pondo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine to scan but did not work for my application
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: It has been 3 months since I started using this scanner, its not working now. Very bad quality
customer_reviews.author: Riaz Ali

customer_reviews.title: very good product for a small hardware store, love it
customer_reviews.text: Used it almost a year now and have not even recharged it yet. The first one I received did not work. I contact them they sent me a new one and it works great. Thanks for great product, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Inateck Customer Service was AWESOME and help me troubleshoot
customer_reviews.text: First one didn't beep when item was scanned. Inateck Customer Service was AWESOME and help me troubleshoot.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: The battery stays charged a LONG time. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery stays charged a LONG time. I have dropped it a few times, and it has survived every time.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly out of the box, and I use it often as a spur-of-the-moment scanner, and works from wherever I am in my store.
customer_reviews.author: Martire

customer_reviews.title: Wireless range is great. It reads poor barcodes with no problem
customer_reviews.text: Wireless range is great. It reads poor barcodes with no problem. Unit is lightweight and feels natural in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like not being required to use the supplied USB cable, except for charging. My productivity has increased.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I use the scanner in a mobile store. Can scan product from the back of the truck. Pretty durable it has hit the floor more than once and still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to build a spreadsheet for large amounts of bar codes
customer_reviews.text: Needed it quickly and it scans directly to a spreadsheet which was perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I am using this with my POS system, and so far it is working fine. Easy set up, basically plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: T H

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 worked fine for about 90 days and then the trigger stuck.
customer_reviews.author: William Olson

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Inateck!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, much cheaper than what I expected and great customer service! I had an issue with the laser that scans the barcode and when I reached out to the manufacturer they sent me a new one literally in one day!
customer_reviews.author: ASAP TECH REPAIR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Scanner. The wireless range also is long than ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Scanner . The wireless range also is long than I expect.
customer_reviews.author: akml

customer_reviews.title: great product saved me a lot of time
customer_reviews.text: Worked out of the box with Windows 8, plug and play . Scanned perfectly , great product saved me a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris92620

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good... really not fast As i wanted but it really works good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than i thought
customer_reviews.text: Light weight portable holds data for batch processing if simple enough process. Durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Works flawless in Excel. No range issues on wireless. I have not tested the bulk update, but I see that being a valuable function as well. Very happy with this purchase. Main use is to scan MAC address on VDI machines. No issues reading the bar codes. Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Arron Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, no problem reading long barcodes even on slightly curved surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner. Works better than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scanner. I use it to scan attendance cards and the wireless make is easy. Great range too. I use it about 100 ft away and works through several walls
customer_reviews.author: Keith Miller

customer_reviews.title: works great. the small USB antenna is more user friendly ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. the small USB antenna is more user friendly than the bigger Bluetooth ones when used on a laptop that gets moved around. only have to charge overnight once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It works alright. wont scan from more than 8" distance or if the barcode is under clear tape, or dirty or a little wrinkled etc. But it's a cheap one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Hari Pammal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless scanner, for the price, also there customer support is very good and responsive..
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: I bought five and I love them. We are using to conduct inventory of ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a bargain. I bought five and I love them. We are using to conduct inventory of bar coded dry cleaning at all of our locations.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent performance and range
customer_reviews.text: Excellent performance and range. Considering the low price of this scanner it is a great deal. By the way, my scanner is an all black unit. I'm not sure if the color being different from the picture would be a deal breaker for some.
customer_reviews.author: RaySr

customer_reviews.title: Battery life good. The Bluetooth dongle is so small
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Battery life good. The Bluetooth dongle is so small, one needs to take care not to loose it. That said, once in a laptop, it never gets in the way like a thumb drive.
customer_reviews.author: Tedman A. Fehlhaber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Scanner works great. I use it all the time with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: work great when using the usb cable but the wireless range is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S sharp

customer_reviews.title: This item has saved our business a ton of time ...
customer_reviews.text: This item has saved our business a ton of time, simple setup, just plug the receiver into your PC and go.
customer_reviews.author: Cory D.

customer_reviews.title: Well built and worked right out of the box. ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built and worked right out of the box. No programming needed for my application. (Standard code read / write)
customer_reviews.author: Rich S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with my purchase and would encourage others to buy this scanner.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy

customer_reviews.title: Works great for us and has already paid for itself!
customer_reviews.text: This scanner has already paid for itself. I went down to our warehouse and scanned a bunch of items that weren't listed online. I came back to my pc and opened excel and imported the scans. I then made my listings and voila within a day or two I had a few sales which paid for this scanner. Seems to work great, and I rarely need to charge it!
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Mack

customer_reviews.title: I had to return this item because it does not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality barcode scanner. I have bought a few other units and was looking for a better quality build. Some units would scan at random without a press of the button. This unit was well built. I had to return this item because it does not support STX/ETX. There is no fix at the moment so just a heads up to anyone who might be looking for a similar solution. The company cares about their products, they will take good care to ensure you are satisfied with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: FreddyT

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Simply plug in the wireless dongle ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Simply plug in the wireless dongle or USB cable. Reads all the barcodes I deal with, but has trouble with very small barcodes. We occasionally scan small IMEI labels (15 characters, 2 cm wide), and some work, others don't.
customer_reviews.author: Sonim I.

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.text: it works very well especially for the price. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: ANN JONES

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner with a long distance
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner with a long distance, I use it to scan vehicle Vin bar codes and it does it well
customer_reviews.author: jeffery j furbush

product_meta.title: Inateck 2.4GHz Wireless USB Automatic Barcode Scanner Handheld Bar-Code Reader, BCST-20
feature_bullets: Wide Compatibility: Inateck BCST-20 is compatible with multiple systems including Windows, MacOS, Linux, Android (OTG required), and Raspberry Pi
Plug and Play: Plug the scanner into your device, and you’re good to go! It supports 2.4 GHz and wired connections. The effective distance of 2.4 GHz transmission reaches up to 50 m

Prolonged Battery Life: The barcode scanner is built with 800 mAh battery. Plus low power consumption sleep function, the battery can last half a month at the most. After a full recharge, the barcode scanner can work one week under frequent use
Built to Last: The scanner is built very sturdy in structure. The TPE protective case effectively cushions the scanner body against falls and shocks

Strong Decoding Ability: The BCST-20 barcode scanner reads almost all kinds of 1D barcodes, including Codabar, Code11, Code128, GS1-128, Industrial 25 / Standard 25, Interleaved 25, Matrix 25, etc. With a memory card, the barcode scanner can store up to 50,000 24-digit barcodes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars654 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
